description: This file is a Java class named UserController, which functions as a REST controller managing user-related API endpoints in a Spring Boot application. It provides endpoints for retrieving user information by identification and for listing users with pagination.

classes.name: UserController
classes.description: A Spring REST controller managing user-related API endpoints, including fetching individual user data and paginated user lists.

methods.name: readUser
methods.description: Handles GET requests to fetch user details by an identification string.

methods.name: readUsers
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve a paginated list of users.
